security_constraints.name: User Identity Verification Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall verify user identity before executing sensitive transactions.
security_constraints.rationale: To prevent unauthorized access and mitigate risks associated with unverified identities.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Identity verification processes, policies, and technical controls

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Sensitive transactions may be executed by unauthorized parties, leading to financial loss and reputational harm.

security_constraints.name: Transaction Data Integrity Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall validate the integrity of transaction data before processing any transaction.
security_constraints.rationale: To prevent processing of corrupted or tampered transaction data.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Validation mechanisms, policies, and technical controls

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Corrupted transaction data may lead to financial discrepancies and loss of trust.

security_constraints.name: Data Confidentiality Protection Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall maintain the confidentiality of customer data at all times.
security_constraints.rationale: To prevent unauthorized access to sensitive customer information.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Access controls, policies, and technical encryption

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Exposure of customer data to unauthorized parties may result in loss of trust and regulatory penalties.

security_constraints.name: Resource Availability Monitoring Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall monitor and maintain sufficient resources to process customer requests in a timely manner.
security_constraints.rationale: To ensure service availability and prevent resource exhaustion.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Monitoring tools, resource scaling policies, and load balancing

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Customers may experience service outages, resulting in dissatisfaction and reputational harm.

security_constraints.name: Transaction Validation Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall validate all transactions before processing to ensure compliance with business rules and regulatory requirements.
security_constraints.rationale: To prevent unauthorized or fraudulent transactions and maintain compliance.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Validation rules, compliance checks, and monitoring tools

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Transactions may be processed without proper validation, leading to financial losses and regulatory violations.

security_constraints.name: Anomaly Detection Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall detect and alert on anomalous activities that may indicate malicious behavior.
security_constraints.rationale: To identify and respond to potential security threats.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Monitoring tools, anomaly detection policies, and incident response plans

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Undetected malicious activities could lead to resource compromise, financial loss, and reputational damage.

security_constraints.name: Data Synchronization Integrity Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall ensure consistent data synchronization across all services.
security_constraints.rationale: To prevent inconsistencies that could lead to data errors or loss of integrity.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Synchronization mechanisms, consistency checks, and auditing

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Inconsistent data synchronization may cause errors in customer transactions and reporting.

security_constraints.name: Regulatory Data Accuracy Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall ensure the accuracy and completeness of data used for regulatory reporting.
security_constraints.rationale: To maintain compliance with regulatory requirements and avoid penalties.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Data validation processes, policies, and technical controls

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Inaccurate regulatory data may lead to compliance violations and reputational harm.
